title: Server lag?
body:
8/10 players in my game just dced 3 times in 1 match, all at the same time.
Whats going on>?

replies.body:
League shut down for me randomly in champ select, just started promos to so already 1 loss down, and iv been in about 5 more champ selects where it keeps getting disbanded and people keep dcing and reconnecting to chat in lobby saying wtf is going on.
So probably is the servers i guess.
Same thing just happened to me. Can talk in client chat but can't connect back to my game.
